post.body: Glad I could help! =) I've saved my self some substantial money, even with shipping from buying on there.
I use Amazon.
I'm thrilled that NoodleScar is coming back! =D
Ah, haven't seen that one yet. I'm sure it's the same feeling with anything McDish. heh
That R&Bish commercial?
It's been good seeing you this weekend also! =)
Going to bed. G'night friends.
If someone DMs you because you follow them, Twitter should let you DM them back in reply even if they aren't following you...
A-freaking-men: http://tinyurl.com/9hbauj
Absolutely amazing photographer: http://tinyurl.com/9w4cj4
Back at IWU... =(
Colts lost! SAD!!!!!
*sigh* Questions questions, friends breaking up who I thought were going to marry, what to do about Italy, other stuff...
So when I was thinking of "Happy New Year" I was thinking of "Happy ending?" or "I clean now?" Oh dear... Family Guy corrupts...
Happy New Year everyone! May God bless this year and draw me and everyone else closer to Him.
My blood sugar is all jacked up. Haven't anything real all day. Getting a headache.
Bummed that Common Ground was cancelled. Going to Target and Best Buy...
Getting ready for church. It's been awhile since the last time I've been to Common Ground.
We have a go for launch.
*turns on X-Box to make sure it still works*
